title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\JobScheduling
name: JobScheduling
description:
Job scheduling options.

Beta Feature: These options are available for testing purposes only. They may be changed before final release.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.JobScheduling

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getMaxFailuresPerHour
methods.description:
Optional. Maximum number of times per hour a driver may be restarted as a result of driver terminating with non-zero code before job is reported failed.

A job may be reported as thrashing if driver exits with non-zero code 4 times within 10 minute window. Maximum value is 10.

Generated from protobuf field int32 max_failures_per_hour = 1;
